Episode.GuestStars: |Ben Horner|Benito Martinez|Benjamin Pelteson|Christopher Lambert|Gary Perez|Jennifer Blood|Jennifer Ferrin|Kyli Zion|Landon Maas|Matt W. Cody|Michael Xavier|Nathan Reid|Ryan Matthew White|Sally Wilpert|Stephen Cerf|Tommy Schrider|
Episode.Overview: Cooper puts his reputation on the line to appeal to the White House on Red’s behalf, as Liz and the task force resume their search for The Corsican, a Blacklister with ties to an international conspiracy. Samar’s abilities in the field are tested.
